name: CVG_RIDERS
description: Table contains the Riders information in the Insurance  Coverage Database.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RIDER_ID_BEN_PACKAGE_NAME
columns.description: *** Deprecated *** In table CLARITY_EPP_OT, the column BEN_PACKAGE_NAME (CMK .2) has been deprecated.  This column already exists as BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM (CMK .2) in table CL_CMK. To look up the deprecated column's value after the Clarity Compass upgrade, join column CLARITY_EPP_OT.BEN_PACKAGE_ID to table CL_CMK column BENEFIT_PACKAGE_ID and get the BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM value.   The name of the benefit package for this benefit plan.The ID of the benefit package is in the column BEN_PACKAGE_ID.

columns.name: RIDER_EFF_DATE
columns.description: Date when the rider becomes effective

columns.name: RIDER_TERM_DATE
columns.description: Date when the rider is no longer effective
